1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Meet the employees of South UK TV Oxford, a fictitious local news channel. After only one week on air things are already falling apart and a fly-on-the-wall documentary crew are there to capture it all. Local news stories that range from excruciatingly dull to utterly ridiculous, technical glitches and journalistic in-fighting all combine to make a day from hell for Alice the newsreader and her team.

2.title: The Wine Hour
2.plot: After a documentary crew arrives to capture the mishaps of local TV channel South UK TV, foodie Robert Shillingford (Paul Barrand) hosts the channel's first ever talk show - the Wine Hour. Only chaos can ensue, as news editor Alice Johnson (Sally Beaumont) leaves assistant editor Kerry Haval (Aleena Kumar) in charge whilst herself and video journalists Tom and Connor head to do a news piece at an abandoned church.

3.title: What The Papers Say
3.plot: News Editor Alice Johnson wants to spice up the channel, so she devices a 'What the Papers Say' segment on the news show. As video journalist Tom and assistant editor Kerry prepare their stories to discuss, Will and Connor hit the town to collect some voxpops with members of the public. Can things go to plan this time?

4.title: Just Desserts
4.plot: It's another busy week for the South UK TV team - Connor hosts his first sports show with cringeworthy guests, Alice heads off to a journo dinner to meet her crush Tom and arch nemesis Sarah, to which Kerry tags along, and Tom and Will are dispatched to interview a local celebrity where more mishaps occur. Could Connor be taking a liking to Kerry?

5.title: Slow News
5.plot: In an effort to up the station's output, Alice holds a 'booking competition' - whoever can book the most shoots, wins a box of chocolates. As Alice and Will go head to head, Kerry and Henry head out to replenish equipment whilst Tom and Connor film at one of Robert's infamous gin talks.

6.title: The Alchester Carnival
6.plot: South UK TV Oxford are media partners for the local Alchester Carnival. As the team prepare to head off for the big day, Alice and Kerry are summoned to meet David Last, the CEO of South UK TV with bad news. With Connor in charge of things, Robert is let loose to film on the food stands whilst Henry is stuck in a giant TV costume.

imdb.plot outline: In Other News is a mockumentary about a local TV channel and the journalists, techies and misfits that work there. You've got the egotistical journalists that sensationalise the simplest stories, the unenthusiastic techie that would rather be elsewhere and the volunteer presenters that just want a slice of fame.
imdb.title: In Other News
plot: _In Other News_ (qv) is a mockumentary about a local TV channel and the journalists, techies and misfits that work there. You've got the egotistical journalists that sensationalise the simplest stories, the unenthusiastic techie that would rather be elsewhere and the volunteer presenters that just want a slice of fame.
